resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text:
Aubrey de Vere

From his affectionate friend

Sara Coleridge June 27

1846.

Aubrey de Vere

From his affectionate friend

Sara Coleridge June 27

1846.

item.value: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M19.72655,15.41778h364.39829v0h364.39829v109.46529v109.46529h-364.39829h-364.39829v-109.46529z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_e39dbcd7-a504-450e-9257-27ac0ea69155" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text:
<span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; white-space-collapse: preserve;">sight of Nature and distant from my native vale, the hues and forms impressed upon my mind in the season of childhood & youth rose up vividly before me and ^were^ presented in this little composition in [every?] combination.
<span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; white-space-collapse: preserve;">I was then living at Hampstead.
resource.chars:
sight of Nature and distant from my native vale, the hues and forms impressed upon my mind in the season of childhood & youth rose up vividly before me and ^were^ presented in this little composition in [every?] combination.

I was then living at Hampstead.
